heading: HB03277
0: AN ACT EXPANDING THE BENEFITS OF THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM SO AS TO PROVIDE FOR UNEMPLOYMENT OR INVOLUNTARY SEPARATION BENEFITS, THEREBY AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8282, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE SOCIAL SECURITY LAW
